annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m addressing the classic and venerable Martini. I decided to make both a Gin Martini and the Dry Martini, which I’m not as...
annotations.title: Martini | How to Drink

textContent:
2oz Old Tom Gin
1oz French Vermouth
1 Dash Absinthe

Stir
Garnish with Lemon Twist

---

Dry Martini
1.5 oz London Dry Gin
1.5 oz of French Vermouth
2 Dashes Orange Bitters

Stir

Garnish with Orange Twist
